name: Mirror Guys
description:
Ivan, Milan and I have made a funny game at Isolation Game Jam 2017 called "Mirror Dudes VR", and it's a local multiplayer VR fighting game where every player records their moves mocap-style and then everybody fights in an arena inspired by a secret volcano spot in Iceland.

Thanks Minnamari, Benóný, Darri, Dario, Jóhannes for being such fierce warriors.
